::Lord Elder/Grimlock::
   
  The party arrives at the command center, entering it. They find Perseus and Windlord studying the consoles.
   
  Elder: Something going on?

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
          Before Jotunn goes after Elder, he turns to the Airtankers.

Jotunn: I'm not sure how the meeting will go, so I think I'll only
take Motherload with me for now. In the meantime, you guys could go
spying around to see what the defenses of the city. Haha! Good luck
for that!

He had meant that as a joke, but Gunrain thought that was a good idea.
He started looking around, getting telemetry data through his aiming
optic.

Motherload (to Jotunn): So, Stormblaze as diversion, eh?

Jotunn: Any better idea?

Motherload: Not quite. How big is the Minion army?

Jotunn: BIG. You'll have your hands full. I'd recommend to go for
spread missiles, shotguns, large beam cannon, and High Heat rounds for
the kills.

Motherload: High Heat? Woah! You must want them extinguished.

Jotunn: Yes... More than anything...

He followed Elder, hoping the plan would work... Hoping they'd all
survive it.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Lord Elder/Grimlock::
> 
> Elder: He is welcome. I had asked him along.
> 
> Elder starts to head for the command center where Perseus was.
> 
> Grimlock starts stomping his way behind them.
> 
> Grimlock: Me Grimlock come too!
> 
> Elder: That's fine. Just don't break anything... more then the
city already is.
> 
> Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
> Jotunn nodded, then paused quizzically.
> 
> Jotunn: Of course I will milord, but I was wondering if we should have
> him join us.
> 
> He jerked a thumb at Dinobot. Dinobot snorted in contemptbut his pride
> was otherwise intact.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> >
> > ::Lord Elder::
> > 
> > Elder: I hope it doesn't take too long to set up the away party.
> > 
> > xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@> wrote:
> > Windlord
> > 
> > windlord nodded and said "When will we depart?"
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> > >
> > > ::Lord Elder::
> > > 
> > > Elder: We'll need you. Thank you. I should go see Perseus and 
> > complete any plans.
> > > 
> > > He turns to Jotunn.
> > > 
> > > Elder: Join me?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
